data.actual_result: the "never expiering" link is listed at the top
data.expected_result: the 24h link should be listed above the "never expiering" link, because it is newer
data.short_description: "recreating" a never expiering invite that already existed, will show it as the newest invite
data.steps_to_repro: - make sure there is no invite in the server settings "instant invites" section  - create an invite - toggle never expiering - delete the 24h invite - create a new invite - toggle never expiering a few times on and off, [the "old" never expiering link will appear if its toggled on] - as soon as you leave the "create invite box", make sure "never expiering" is toggled on - observe "instant invites" in server settings
